title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: An undue focus on your belongings might prevent you from taking an unproven course of action. However, theres a difference between being a responsible steward of what you own and becoming irresponsible to yourself. You can grow so concerned about losing your valuables that you cant fully enjoy life as you deserve. You may discover that your possessions end up possessing you unless you rearrange your priorities. The Dalai Lama said, Attachment constrains our vision so that we are not able to see things from a wider perspective. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
